name: Ngaox for Angular
description: Toolset for speeding and facilitating Angular apps development by providing solutions for common web needs with Angular, such as SVG icons inlining, SEO management, content integration, and more.

name: Moroccan PHPers
description: The Moroccan PHPers is a group of PHP developers and enthusiasts who aim at sharing our knowledge and encourage PHP dev in Morocco. Accelerate your career and skills by participating in our meetups, workshops, talks, challenges...

name: Ngaox Templates
description: Collection of open-source website templates built using Ngaox that showcase the capabilities and flexibility of Ngaox and can be used as a starting point for your own projects.

name: Vibration Analyzer
description: Flutter-based application designed to help users quickly detect and address vibration-related issues. It communicates with an ESP32 device programmed to collect machine vibrations using a GY-521 sensor.
